    • Constructor Detail

      • IOTClient

        public IOTClient(Integer from,
                 Integer to,
                 String token,
                 boolean log,
                 String serverName)
          throws IOException
        Constructor for IOTClient, initialize all things that will be required in future.
        Parameters:
        from - Current Device code
        to - Destination Device code
        token - Subscription key, you can find it in settings page
        log - choose weather to log the values in CLI Screen, boolean type.
        serverName - specify the server address default is iorresearch.ml
        Throws:
        IOException

      • IOTClient

        public IOTClient(Integer from,
                 Integer to,
                 String token,
                 boolean log)
          throws IOException
        IOT Client constructor
        Parameters:
        from - specify the current device unique code
        to - specify the destination device unique code
        token - specify the subscription key
        log - weather the client should show the logs on CLI or now
        Throws:
        IOException

      • setReadFunction

        public void setReadFunction(java.util.function.Function<SocketMessage,Boolean> f)
        Sets the function that has to be called whenever client receives a Message from server.
        Parameters:
        f - Function Object, can also be implemented using Lambda SocketMessage will be argument to function and Boolean is return type.
